title: Smoking #11 and Reviewing Cigar Magazines
itunes:title: Smoking #11 and Reviewing Cigar Magazines
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority we smoke two cigars that were so good they got two #1’s. Coming in at #11 on the Cigar Aficionado list was Hammer + Sickle Tradition and #11 in Cigar Journal was La Boheme from Boutique Blends…

We also hear from Old Fart Freddy for the last time and hear from Dave on Rating Cigar Magazine…

Join us with special guest Eric Hanson of Hammer + Sickle
